value: Natural Language Understanding and Inference with MLLM in Visual Question Answering: A Survey

TLDR: This survey reveals how giant leaps in Visual Question Answering (VQA) are fueled by multimodal large language models (MLLMs). It breaks down how these models tackle VQA through clever image-to-text strategies, acting as central controllers orchestrating visual understanding, or even directly integrating visual info. The real game-changer? The survey shows how adding knowledge reasoning (from simple fact-checking to complex multi-hop logic) using LLMs significantly boosts VQA's ability to answer tough questions, pushing the field far beyond simple image recognition. Get ready to dive into a detailed exploration of the cutting-edge!
